  • Method Details

    • bgAndFont

      public java.lang.String bgAndFont​(java.lang.String bg, java.lang.String font)
      permit to create the code to change the aspect of the output created an Ansi code to change the color of background and font
      Parameters:
      bg - is the code of the color for the background
      font - is the code of the color for the font
      Returns:
      the instruction to change output's aspect ( background and font)

    • font

      public java.lang.String font​(java.lang.String font)
      permit to create the code to change the aspect of the output created an Ansi code to change the color of the font
      Parameters:
      font - is the code of the color for the font
      Returns:
      the instruction to change output's aspect (font)

    • bg

      public java.lang.String bg​(java.lang.String bg)
      permit to create the code to change the aspect of the output created an Ansi code to change the color of the background
      Parameters:
      bg - is the code of the color for the background
      Returns:
      the instruction to change output's aspect (Background)
